column4: After the make install comand,ervery program can't executable.  I can't execute make uninstall or make clean command.  So I shutdown my computer.  And it can't bootable now.  Can anyone help me please! I dont whant to reinstall the OS.
Secondly, Ubuntu 9.10 is no longer supported, you should be using a newer release.
You shouln't install a different version of glibc that differs from the one that comes with it. Lots of things will break.
You'll likely need to reinstall. libc6 is an essential part of your operating system and trying to replace it wwill cause issues.
